name: Puppy Love Bow Back Bra
description: This pure cotton bandeau bra is like nothing else in your lingerie collection: it has gentle gathering at the front and darted cups to create a flattering shape, while a massive bow at the back adds all the drama to this piece. If you take a look up close, you'll see that the all over print features all kinds of pooches from poodles to dachsunds, Scotties and bulldogs! The straps are fully adjustable for your comfort. As this bra has no underwires or padding it provides light to medium support, it is best suited to smaller cup sizes. It's also finished on the inside with a luxurious cotton/silk mix lining to protect sensitive skin. Click here to view the matching knickers that complete this adorable set. 100% cotton (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. ** Please note that this piece is now only available in a sizes EXTRA SMALL and SMALL.** Please allow up to 2 working days for this item to be shipped.

name: Flirt Knickers
description:
With our Flirt tie side knickers, it can be spring all year round. A fresh Liberty of London floral print adorns these cotton knickers, while bluebell-coloured satin ribbons compliment the look. They are lined with soft cotton jersey, so these knickers are just as comfortable as they are cute! 

100% cotton (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash.

***Please note that the matching bra shown in this look is no longer available for sale.***

Please allow up to 2 working days from your payment clearing for your order to be shipped.

description: We're excited about introducing this limited edition Liberty of London print to our collection. Featuring a classic floral print on lightweight cotton, these knickers are the perfect retro-inspired design for the modern undie collection. These knickers are also currently available in a pink and white floral Liberty print cotton, which you can view by clicking here. These knickers are ready to ship, and available in size medium (UK 10-12/US 6-8). ***Please note that the matching bra shown in this look is no longer available for sale.*** 100% cotton (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. Please allow up to 2 working days from your payment clearing for your order to be shipped.

The carefully stitched fringing captures the slightest swish of the hips. These knickers are also available in a vibrant red colourway, which you can view by clicking here. 100% silk (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. All of our items are handmade to order, unless otherwise stated. Please allow up to 7 days for your item(s) to be made and shipped.

name: Belle De Jour Knickers

Our glamorous Belle De Jour knickers are one of the most luxurious panties in our collection. They feature ebony lace lovingly stitched on to the softest pure silk satin. Not only do these knickers look great but they feel gorgeous against the skin. Black ribbon ties mean they're easily adjusted to fit you just right.

100% silk (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash.

All of our items are handmade to order, unless otherwise stated. Please allow up to 7 days for your item(s) to be made and shipped.

name: Tease Knickers
description: Our super sexy Tease knickers are one of the most daring pieces in the current Love Baby Grand collection. Featuring subtle polkadots all over extra fine mesh, they are finished with a cotrasting ribbon and rosebud combination to decorate the front. These knickers are made with a luxurious pure silk satin lining for maximum comfort. This listing is for the knickers only, but we also have a matching bra and garter belt within the Tease range, which make a tempting set when worn with these pretty panties. (If you would prefer these knickers with a different look, we also make them in a design with pink satin ribbon ties, which you can view here.) 100% silk and 100% polyester mesh (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. All of our items are handmade to order, unless otherwise stated. Please allow up to 7 days for your item(s) to be made and shipped.

name: Bliss Knickers
description: There's a little bit of everything thrown into making these fun but luxurious knickers: a gorgeous white silk satin front, cute matching ruffle elastic and a very cheeky sheer polkadot tulle bum. The front is decorated with a cute little something blue in the form of a pretty ribbon bow, and topped with a satin rosebud detail. These knickers are ready to ship, and available in size SMALL (UK 8-10/US 4-6). (The black silk and tulle bra seen in this look can be bought here.) 100% silk and 100% polyester mesh (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. Please allow up to 2 working days for your item to be shipped.

name: Tease Triangle Bra
description: The Tease triangle bra is designed to bring out your inner vamp, featuring a daringly sheer polkadot tulle and luxurious pure silk finishes. The cups are darted to create a flattering shape, whilst a gathered silk satin underbust offers gentle support and added comfort. Fully adjustable straps mean that you can get the fit just right. As this bra has no underwires or padding it provides light to medium support, it is best suited to smaller cup sizes. A matching suspender belt and hipster or tie side knickers are available to complete this adorable set. 100% silk and 100% polyester mesh (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. All of our items are handmade to order, unless otherwise stated. Please allow up to 7 days for your item(s) to be made and shipped.

name: Devilry Blindfold
description: A luxurious pure silk blindfold designed to inspire the romantic imagination. This decadent boudoir accessory is lightly padded for your comfort, and features the luxury of black silk satin contrasted with a tattoo-inspired lace and embroidery skull motif. The standard design comes with extravagant satin ribbon ties, but you can order it with an elasticated strap if you prefer to have the option to use it as a sleep mask. Both designs lock out light, so they are perfect for sleep or play! Click here to buy the luxurious silk knickers that complete this set. 100% silk (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. All of our items are handmade to order, unless otherwise stated. Please allow up to 7 days for your item(s) to be made and shipped.

Each is finished with a pretty pink satin ribbon to compliment the equally foxy Tease bra and either the matching hipster or tie-side knickers. 100% silk (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. description: We named these knickers as a play on the idea that they make any bottom look pretty and peachy! With these knickers, most of the detail is at the back, where delicate ruching is used to accentuate the bum. The Peachy Keen knickers are all made of luxurious pure silk satin, and are finished with a pretty rosebud and hand-tied bow detail at the front. ***Please note that the Rose and Fuchsia colours are now sold out*** If you would prefer a cheekier version of these knickers, we also make them in a sheer black silk, which you can buy here. 100% silk (exclusive of trimmings). name: Bisou Knickers
description:
We couldn't resist adding this quirky perfume print chiffon to the collection, while out fabric shopping for something else entirely. With old fashioned perfume bottles, pearls and vintage hair combs printed on slightly sheer pastel chiffon, it was too pretty to resist. All that was needed was the addition of ruffled organza elastic, a single black satin bow, and the 'Bisou' -meaning 'kiss' in French- was born.

Please allow up to 7 days from your payment clearing for your order to be completed and shipped.

name: Amour Knickers
description:
Our charming bird print hipster knickers come in a subtle barely-there shade of chiffon that flatters a variety of skin tones. Each pair is finished with a contrasting black frilled elastic and a matching black bow for extra prettiness, and lined with silk for added comfort.

Please allow up to 7 days from your payment clearing for your order to be completed and shipped.

This design comes either as a blindfold with extravagant satin ribbon ties, or you can order it with an elasticated strap if you prefer to have the option to use it as a sleep mask. Both designs block out light, so they are perfect for sleep or play. Click here to find matching silk knickers that complete this set. 100% silk (exclusive of trimmings). Hand wash. name: Belle De Jour Blindfold

This decadent boudoir accessory features the luxury of ivory silk satin overlayed with ebony lace, contrasted with the softest black silk backing which feels exquisitely soft against the skin. All of our eye masks are lightly padded for added comfort.

This design comes either as a blindfold with extravagant satin ribbon ties, or you can order it with an elasticated strap if you prefer to have the option to use it as a sleep mask. Both designs block out light, so they are perfect for sleep or play.

name: Black Heart Nipple Tassels/Pasties
description:
Our fabulous black heart nipple tassels are great fun. They are easily matched with your best pair of black knickers to make a show stopping set. Stick them on with eyelash glue or double sided costume tape, so you don't shake them loose. These are the perfect accessory to add showgirl vava voom to a cosy night in or to razzle dazzle 'em on stage! 

Your pastie size is not necessarily relative to your bust size. Our pasties come in at approximately 5.5cm/2.25inches in diameter as standard. If you would prefer another size, please contact us about making a bespoke pair especially for you. 

All of our items are handmade to order, unless otherwise stated. Please allow up to 7 days for your item(s) to be made and shipped.

name: Set Of Four Detachable Garters
description:
Because a lady likes to have a bit of variety, you can now add detachable garters to your order of any of our knickers.

We simply add four concealed ribbon loops to the underwear so you can instantly convert them into classic garter knickers.

You can also buy these in a custom length, quantity or colourway, which is perfect if you would like to wear them with a lingerie piece you already own, such as a favourite corset. Please contact us to arrange a custom order.

The garters come with black sliders, and a sliver of satin ribbon covering the grips. The elastic is currently available in

baby pink
black
white

All of our items are handmade to order, unless otherwise stated. Please allow up to 7 days for your item(s) to be made and shipped.
